/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on income inclusions from government programs, including
Social Security lump-sum death benefit
Department of Labor (DoL) employment programs
VA education or compensation benefits
VA pension benefits
multiple VA benefits
accrued VA benefits
VA Program of Comprehensive Assistance for Family Caregivers (PCAFC) stipend
Conservation Resource Program (CRP) payments
, and
Vietnam Era bonus payments
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
